values: 碎片；（食物等的）薄片；片屑；炸薯条；玉米片；（作赌注用的）筹码；（木头、玻璃等的）缺口；凹口；（足球）吊射；（高尔夫）切削球；木屑；（木头、玻璃等上掉下来的）碎屑；碎片；碎渣；陶瓷碎片；（牙齿、玻璃等的）小裂片；（绘画、家具等的）剥落处；土豆条（尤指英式英语中）；（在牌桌上用作赌注的）小圆盘；（体育运动中的）小球高击球；（用于各种游戏的）小圆形标记物；琐碎之物；（干焦或无味）的东西；无价值的东西；（高尔夫球）近穴球
切下；削下；将（土豆等）切条；削减；剥落；刻出；雕刻出；切割（材料）；削薄；打破；弄缺；凿开；凿破；踢出短弧线球；<方>使绊倒；摔倒；（高尔夫球）近穴击球；植入微芯片；发吱喳声

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 削片机；凿子；削东西的人；唧唧喳喳

word_group.brief_definition: 凑钱, 捐助；出力；出钱；加入谈话
在危急关头, 在关键时刻
(相貌或性格)酷似父亲或母亲的人
word_group.phrase: a chip off the old block

word_group.brief_definition: 油漆剥落的斑点；颜色卡片
单片微计算机；单片微型计算机；单片机
倒装芯片；倒装晶片；翻转芯片

bilingual.source: You can buy it and eat in special fish and chip shops on the high street.
bilingual.target: 你可以在大街上的炸鱼加炸薯条专店购买并食用它。

bilingual.source: I do not like the chip they serve here-they are too greasy.
bilingual.target: 我不喜欢这里做的炸薯条，太油腻了。

bilingual.source: Burger King describes its new 'burger' as having "crispy golden fries, mayo and ketchup, nestled between two soft buns. His Royal Fry-ness, the CHIP BUTTYhas arrived".
bilingual.target: 汉堡王将其新推出的新品描述为“酥脆的金色薯条搭配着蛋黄酱和番茄酱夹在两个软面包之间”。这绝对是炸薯条的豪华版本。

bilingual.source: The young man had a chip on his shoulder.
He asked Alex to draw Biff, Chip, Kipper and Floppy.
bilingual.target: 他请亚历克斯画比夫、奇普、基珀和弗洛比。

bilingual.source: Alex Brychta writes stories about Biff, Chip and Kipper.
bilingual.target: 亚历克斯·布莱奇塔写关于比夫、奇普和基珀的故事。

bilingual.source: You can buy it and eat it in special fish and chip shops.
bilingual.target: 你可以在专门的炸鱼薯条店买到并吃到它。

bilingual.source: In July, Alex illustrated the first story about Biff, Chip and Kipper.
bilingual.target: 七月，亚历克斯为关于比夫、奇普和基珀的第一个故事画了插图。
单片机是一种集成电路芯片。

bilingual.source: He gave me a chocolate chip cookie.
bilingual.target: 他给了我一个巧克力片小甜饼。

list.abstract: 集成电路（integrated circuit）是电路（主要包括半导体设备，也包括被动组件等）小型化的方式，采用一定的工艺，把一个电路中所需的晶体管、电阻、电容和电感等元件及布线互连一起，制作在一小块或几小块半导体晶片或介质基片上，然后封装在一个管壳内，成为具有所需电路功能的微型结构；其中所有元件在结构上已组成一个整体，使电子元件向着微小型化、低功耗、智能化和高可靠性方面迈进了一大步。 它是微型电子器件或部件，在电路中用字母“IC”表示，发明者为杰克·基尔比（基于锗（Ge）的集成电路）和罗伯特·诺伊思（基于硅（Si）的集成电路）。当今半导体工业大多数应用的是基于硅的集成电路，是20世纪50年代后期到60年代发展起来的一种新型半导体器件。

“Chip”技术作为生命科学的最新技术，被广泛的应用于各个生命科学领域，包括疾病预测与诊断、基因突变检测、遗传学产前诊断等临床应用中。其原理为在固定支持物上原位合成寡核苷酸或直接将大量DNA探针以显示微打印的方式有序地固化于支持物表面作为固相探针，待测的核酸片段人工标记上不同的荧光色素或同位素、生物素等作为靶片段，一定条件下两者杂交，根据杂交后不同的信息，进行计算机分析，从而得到靶片段的基因序列、表达情况等信息。芯片技术包括最常见的DNA芯片（基因芯片）、蛋白芯片、microRNA芯片及最新开放的新型芯片等。

yingyinNormal.en: Why is it called a super-chip?
yingyinNormal.zh: 它为什么叫超级芯片？

yingyinNormal.en: Chip. Hi, it's Rachel. Rachel Green.
yingyinNormal.zh: 奇普，我是瑞秋，瑞秋格林。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey. You guys finally chip in for a bodyguard?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们终于合伙雇了位保镖啦？

yingyinNormal.en: Happy Thanksgiving. Not for me. Chip and I broke up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 感恩节快乐。我不快乐，奇普和我分手了。

yingyinNormal.en: You mean the chocolate chip cookie recipe? Uh-huh, yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是说巧克力碎片饼干的食谱吗?

yingyinNormal.en: George, I need some help! I'm making chocolate chip cookies!
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治，我需要帮忙！我现在在做巧克力饼干呢！

yingyinNormal.en: Chip! Chip! Have you seen Chip? He ran off. Where is my little boy? Mama! Oh, no! Ma!
yingyinNormal.zh: 阿齐！你看见阿齐了吗？他不见了。我的孩子你在哪儿？妈妈！哦，不。妈妈！

yingyinNormal.en: It is Gorg super-chip.
yingyinNormal.zh: 格尔族的超级芯片。

yingyinNormal.en: It is Gorg super-chip!
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是格尔族的超级芯片！

yingyinNormal.en: Now? Is it okay if I go out with Chip Matthews?
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在？我跟他约会没关系吧？

yingyinNormal.en: Are you going to remove my health care chip? Yes, open.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是否要移除我的医疗保健芯片？是啊，打开。

yingyinNormal.en: What? Gorg drone crashed and I ran to it and I found the chip.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么？格尔族无人机撞坏了，我遇到了，结果就找到芯片。

yingyinNormal.en: Chip! Chip! Oh, Lord! As punishment she transformed him into a hideous beast. And placed a powerful spell on the castle and all who lived there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当心！哦，上帝。为了惩罚王子女巫把他变成了一头丑陋的野兽，并且给整座城堡和里面的仆人也施加了强大的魔咒。

yingyinNormal.en: Wow. Look at that, Chip Matthews called. I wonder what he wants?
yingyinNormal.zh: 看看奇普马修斯打电话来，不晓得有什么事。

yingyinNormal.en: Lot of big talk from a man who can't draw a chocolate chip cookie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 巧克力豆饼干都画不好的人还敢在此大放厥词。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey. When were you gonna tell me that you're going out with Chip Matthews?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要什么时候告诉我你要跟奇普约会？

yingyinNormal.en: Digital immunization chip. We were all ready to go into production next year.
yingyinNormal.zh: 数字免疫芯片，我们准备明年就投产。

yingyinNormal.en: If you're into it, you, chip in 20 bucks, and scariest house on the street wins the pot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你想加入，就交20块，街上最吓人的房子获得奖金[大麻]。

yingyinNormal.en: He just got his tenth one-month sober chip. Yeah, she's gonna make him a little necklace.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他刚获得了他的第十个"一个月没喝酒"奖章，她要给他做个奖章小项链。

yingyinNormal.en: Ahah. Programmed to over 10,000 medical procedures. This chip is what makes Baymax Baymax.
yingyinNormal.zh: 啊哈，他被编入超过一万种医疗护理程序，大白之所以成为大白，就是靠这个芯片。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: cut or break a small piece from the edge or surface of a hard material

examination_example.sentence: "They love <highlight>Chip</highlight> and Joanna Gaines just as much as the rest of us," he said.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他说：“他们爱奇普和乔安娜·盖恩斯，就像我们其他人一样。”

word_usage.usage: chip作动词时，既可作及物动词，又可作不及物动词。作及物动词时，其后可接名词或代词，如：chip my best glass

direction_info.description:

由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Chips</highlight> will be inserted in human brains.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 芯片将被植入人类大脑。

examination_example.sentence: You know, back to teabags and fish and <highlight>chips</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你知道的，回到茶包，鱼和薯条上。

sense_info_list.en: a long thin piece of potato fried in oil or fat

examination_example.sentence: PepsiCo claims a packet of its <highlight>chips</highlight> now contains less salt than a slice of white bread.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 百事可乐声称，其一包薯片现在比一片白面包含有更少的盐。

examination_example.sentence: Potato <highlight>chips</highlight> in Japan are being sold for 6 times their normal price.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 日本的薯条售价是正常价格的6倍。

sense_info_list.en: cut or break a small piece from the edge or surface of a hard material
sense_info_list.zh: 切; 削; 切片; 碎屑

examination_example.sentence: Hackman noted that teams are hampered by problems of co-ordination and motivation that <highlight>chip</highlight> away at the benefits of collaboration.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 哈克曼指出，团队受到协调和动力问题的阻碍，这些问题削弱了协作的好处。

sense_info_list.en: contribute something as one's share of a joint activity; cost; etc.

examination_example.sentence: The whole village <highlight>chips</highlight> in to help, including the kids, who end up developing their baking skills at an early age.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 整个村子都会参与进来，包括孩子们，所以他们在很小的时候就能学习烘焙。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

word_level_phrase_info.phrase: have a chip on one's shoulder

examination_example.sentence: The cheapest food is fish and <highlight>chips</highlight> (炸鱼薯条).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最便宜的食物是炸鱼薯条。

examination_example.sentence: Then they can use the powder to make other foods like <highlight>chips</highlight>, protein bars, biscuits and so on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后，他们可以用面粉制作其他食物，如薯片、蛋白质棒、饼干等。

examination_example.sentence: This is good news as most popular snacks, like sweets and potato <highlight>chips</highlight> are usually unhealthy and full of calories.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是个好消息，因为大多数受欢迎的零食，如糖果和薯片，通常都是不健康的，而且富含卡路里。

sense_info_list.zh: (have a chip on one's shoulder)生气; 耿耿于怀

examination_example.sentence: She was kind to us before, but recently she had a <highlight>chip</highlight> on her shoulder.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她以前对我们很好，但最近她气坏了。

examination_example.sentence: The underlined words "had a <highlight>chip</highlight> on her shoulder" most probably mean got angry easily.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 带下划线的单词“她肩膀上有一块碎片”最接近的意思是很容易生气。
